history.proof: intros l a. induction l. - intros H. inversion H. - simpl. intros H. hauto use: in_map_fst_inv, add_frequency_list_in_inv, frequency_list_in.

exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros l a. induction l. - intros H. inversion H. - simpl. intros H. destruct H as [H | H]. + left. rewrite <- H. apply in_fst. + right. apply IHl. apply H.
